title: Given MPS what is MPC and multiplier

content.prompt: If people save 10 percent of each additional dollar received in income, which of the following is true?

choices.label: The marginal propensity to consume is less than the marginal propensity to save.
The marginal propensity to consume increases as income increases.
The marginal propensity to consume is 0.1, and the maximum value of the tax multiplier is âˆ’1.
The marginal propensity to consume equals the marginal propensity to save.
The marginal propensity to consume is 0.9, and the maximum value of the spending multiplier is 10.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
